full_text: From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) To: Lee Plourde (b)(6) @bop.gov> Subject: Re: Press Release - MCC New York.pdf Sent: Sat, 10 Aug 2019 15:48:38 +0000 Thank you, Lee. Some additional questions: Did Mr. Epstein apparently hang himself? Who found him? An officer? Another inmate? Was he in his cell alone? Was he on some type of suicide watch, given the incident last month, and what did that entail? Many thanks, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (202) 629-(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) From: Lee Plourde (b)(6) @bop.gov> Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 11:46:32 AM To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Subject: Press Release - MCC New York.pdf CAUTION: EXTERNAL SENDER Good morning, Please see the attached press release of an incident that iccured this morning August 10, 2019 at MCC New York 150 Park Row, NY 10007. If you should have any further questions please feel free to contact me. Thank you Lee Plourde.

text_blocks.content: From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) To: Lee Plourde (b)(6) @bop.gov> Subject: Re: Press Release - MCC New York.pdf Sent: Sat, 10 Aug 2019 15:48:38 +0000

Thank you, Lee. Some additional questions: Did Mr. Epstein apparently hang himself? Who found him? An officer? Another inmate? Was he in his cell alone? Was he on some type of suicide watch, given the incident last month, and what did that entail? Many thanks,
From: Lee Plourde (b)(6) @bop.gov> Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 11:46:32 AM To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Subject: Press Release - MCC New York.pdf

Good morning, Please see the attached press release of an incident that iccured this morning August 10, 2019 at MCC New York 150 Park Row, NY 10007. If you should have any further questions please feel free to contact me. Thank you Lee Plourde.

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with some redacted information. The emails discuss an incident involving Mr. Epstein at MCC New York.
